featured.text: According to the legend, notes of 33 plans for a revolution to overthrow the Mongols were hidden in mooncakes that would ordinarily have been stuffed with sweet bean paste.

definition.zh_def: 豆類植物的種子，通常可食用，富含蛋白質和營養。
definition.en_def: The seeds of leguminous plants, typically edible and rich in protein and nutrients.
definition.example: I added some black beans to my salad for extra protein.
